Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Methods for solving problems in a wide variety of mathematical fields, with an emphasis on proper mathematical technique and writing of solutions.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Reinforcement and development of algebra skills. Operations with polynomial, rational expressions; radicals; rational exponents; linear and quadratic equations, linear inequalities, and applications. This course is a "bridge course" which may be applied towards a degree as elective credit. This course will not satisfy either the GEP or Gordon Rule.
